h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
content: There are 4 Purple Talismans to find. You can pick up 3 of them throughout the Webbed Hollow, and the last one is collected from the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. You'll find a detailed walkthrough below of where to get each one.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Find_All_Purple_Talisman_Altars_in_Chapter_4.md", within the section "How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4" and the sub-section "How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow". The content is presented below:

There are 4 Purple Talismans to find. You can pick up 3 of them throughout the Webbed Hollow, and the last one is collected from the Temple of the Yellow Flowers. You'll find a detailed walkthrough below of where to get each one.
